Name: Asteroids 44 (For Four)
About the game: Remake of one of the oldest arcade classics. Challenge yourself and advance through the levels filled with asteroids, power-ups and bitcoins. Get your friends and share the adventure together in co-op mode! Grab as many power-ups as you can along the way and collect bitcoins (not real bitcoins) and spend them to improve your ship.
